name: unifndx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cunif, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat3))
-| wceq(cunif, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat3)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat3), cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ (UnifSet ` ndx)= cdc(1, 3)
⊣ UnifSet = Slot(cdc(1, 3))
⊣ cdc(1, 3)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cunif, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat3))
-| wceq(cunif, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat3)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat3), cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (UnifSet ` ndx)= cdc(1, 3)
⊣ UnifSet = Slot(cdc(1, 3))
⊣ cdc(1, 3)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cunif, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat3))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat3), cn)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat3), cn)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat3, cn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cunif, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat3))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat3, cn)

|- wceq(cfv(cunif, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat3))
-| wcel(nat3, cn)

comment: Index value of the ~ df-unif slot. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2017.)
